definition: transverse wave
harsh and unreasonable/unexpected

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
wave/ripple/storm/surge
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Polarization of shear-wave is analysed by using particle motion diagram.
sentences.chinese: 用质点运动图的方法对横波的偏振进行了分析。

sentences.english: A scalar wave tends to propagate as a transverse wave or a standing wave.
sentences.chinese: 分级梯状波往往是以横波或驻波传播。

sentences.english: Therefore, t he porosity obtained from S-wave should be used cautiously.
sentences.chinese: 因此，由横波求出的孔隙度应慎重使用。

sentences.english: The velocity of the latter is closely related to that of the shear wave.
sentences.chinese: 弯曲波模式的速度和横波速度近似相关。
